description: Detects when an Elastic Container Service (ECS) Task Definition has been modified and run. This can indicate an adversary adding a backdoor to establish persistence or escalate privileges. This rule is based on examining events created upon execution of Rhino Security Lab's Pacu in a lab environment.
false_positives: Task Definition being modified to request credentials from the Task Metadata Service for valid reasons
name: AWS ECS Backdoor Task Definition
query: (eventSource:"ecs.amazonaws.com" AND eventName:("DescribeTaskDefinition" OR "RegisterTaskDefinition" OR "RunTask") AND requestParameters.containerDefinitions.command:*169.254* AND requestParameters.containerDefinitions.command:*$AWS_CONTAINER_CREDENTIALS*)
author: Darin Smith
